scripts.build:archive: mkdir -p lib/dist && cd src/ && tar --exclude '*__pycache__*' -cf ../lib/dist/basthon.tar basthon && cd -
scripts.build:modules: BASTHON_MODULES='lib/dist/modules' ; for d in $(find src/modules/ -mindepth 1 -maxdepth 1 -type d); do cd $d ; make build ; cd - ; done && mkdir -p $BASTHON_MODULES/extern && cp $(find src/modules/ -type f -name '*.whl') $BASTHON_MODULES && cp $(find src/modules/ -path '*/extern/*' -type f) $BASTHON_MODULES/extern
scripts.clean:modules: for d in $(find src/modules/ -mindepth 1 -maxdepth 1 -type d); do cd $d ; make clean ; cd - ; done
scripts._postinstall: PYODIDE_VERSION=$(python3 pyodide_version.py) && mkdir -p lib/dist/ && wget -qO- https://github.com/pyodide/pyodide/releases/download/$PYODIDE_VERSION/pyodide-build-$PYODIDE_VERSION.tar.bz2 | tar xjvf - -C lib/dist/
